title:
To how many chickens is the rooster crowing near the Municipal Golf Course hole number 4? 

(I was sitting there four hours on Friday watching for a hole-in-one during the Wilmington Lions Club\'s Golf Tournament and the rooster crowed continually. Heavy woods kept me from seeing the farm.) Are there other animals on this farm in the city?
text:
The answer is, sadly, we don't know. Our reporter has tried
repeatedly to get the answer, but because this is a private residence,
we'll unable to get an answer. He's seen a few, but never any other
animals. The rooster, clearly, is more than enough.
